mapper.select: select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,Q1.bb_Last_Amt,Q1.bb_Las_amt_act,Q1.bb_Las_amt_unact,Q1.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q2.bb_Now_Amt,Q2.bb_Now_amt_act,Q2.bb_Now_amt_unact,Q2.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,Q3.ZJ_ZT_REWARD_KD bb_Last_Reward FROM ( (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.bb_Last_Amt,0) bb_Last_Amt,NVL(S3.bb_Las_amt_act,0) bb_Las_amt_act,NVL(S3.bb_Las_amt_unact,0)bb_Las_amt_unact,NVL(S3.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,1)bb_Las_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) bb_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.bb_Now_Amt,0)bb_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.bb_Now_amt_act,0)bb_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.bb_Now_amt_unact,0)bb_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) bb_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.bb_Last_Amt,Q4.bb_Las_amt_unact,Q4.bb_Las_amt_act,Q4.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.bb_Now_Amt,Q5.bb_Now_amt_act,Q5.bb_Now_amt_unact,Q5.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 as bb_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) bb_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') )Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) bb_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') ) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name

select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,Q1.Cdma_Last_Amt,Q1.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,Q1.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q2.Cdma_Now_Amt,Q2.Cdma_Now_amt_act,Q2.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,Q2.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,Q3.ZJ_ZT_REWARD_CDMA Cdma_Last_Reward FROM ( (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Cdma_Last_Amt,0) Cdma_Last_Amt,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,0) Cdma_Las_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_amt_act,0)Cdma_Las_amt_act,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,1)Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Cdma_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_Amt,0)Cdma_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,0)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_amt_act,0)Cdma_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Cdma_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.Cdma_Last_Amt,Q4.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,Q4.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.Cdma_Now_Amt,Q5.Cdma_Now_amt_act,Q5.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,Q5.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 as Cdma_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Cdma_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增'))Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Cdma_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增')) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name

select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,Q1.Itv_Last_Amt,Q1.Itv_Las_amt_act,Q1.Itv_Las_amt_unact,Q1.Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q2.Itv_Now_Amt,Q2.Itv_Now_amt_act,Q2.Itv_Now_amt_unact,Q2.Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate,Q3.ZJ_ZT_REWARD_KD AS Itv_Last_Reward FROM ( (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Itv_Last_Amt,0) Itv_Last_Amt,NVL(S3.Itv_Las_amt_unact,0) Itv_Las_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Itv_Las_amt_act,0)Itv_Las_amt_act,NVL(S3.Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate,1)Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Itv_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_Amt,0)Itv_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_amt_unact,0)Itv_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_amt_act,0)Itv_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Itv_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.Itv_Last_Amt,Q4.Itv_Las_amt_unact,Q4.Itv_Las_amt_act,Q4.Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.Itv_Now_Amt,Q5.Itv_Now_amt_act,Q5.Itv_Now_amt_unact,Q5.Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 AS Itv_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Itv_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增'))Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Itv_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增')) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name

SELECT S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME Zj_Name,S1.DATE_CD,S1.ASSET_ROW_ID,S1.ACCS_NBR,S1.DATA_USER_NAME,S1.PROM_NAME,S1.PROM_AMT, S1.SERV_START_DT,S1.STAT_NAME,S1.XZ_FLG,S1.ACT_FLG,S1.TYPE,S1.ACT_DAYS,S1.CCUST_ID,S1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID,S1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,S1.MIX_COMB_NBR_FLG FROM XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET S1 where s1.act_flg='0' and a.XZ_FLG in('上月新增','当月新增') and S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME in ( select D.zj_new from XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D where d.zj_old = #{zj_name} )

select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,Q1.bb_Last_Amt,Q1.bb_Las_amt_act,Q1.bb_Las_amt_unact,Q1.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q2.bb_Now_Amt,Q2.bb_Now_amt_act,Q2.bb_Now_amt_unact,Q2.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,Q3.ZJ_ZT_REWARD_KD bb_Last_Reward FROM ( (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.bb_Last_Amt,0) bb_Last_Amt,NVL(S3.bb_Las_amt_act,0) bb_Las_amt_act,NVL(S3.bb_Las_amt_unact,0)bb_Las_amt_unact,NVL(S3.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,1)bb_Las_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) bb_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Las_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.bb_Now_Amt,0)bb_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.bb_Now_amt_act,0)bb_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.bb_Now_amt_unact,0)bb_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) bb_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.bb_Last_Amt,Q4.bb_Las_amt_unact,Q4.bb_Las_amt_act,Q4.bb_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.bb_Now_Amt,Q5.bb_Now_amt_act,Q5.bb_Now_amt_unact,Q5.bb_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 as bb_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) bb_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Las_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') )Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) bb_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)bb_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)bb_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='KD' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') ) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name

select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,Q1.Cdma_Last_Amt,Q1.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,Q1.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q2.Cdma_Now_Amt,Q2.Cdma_Now_amt_act,Q2.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,Q2.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,Q3.ZJ_ZT_REWARD_CDMA Cdma_Last_Reward FROM ( (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Cdma_Last_Amt,0) Cdma_Last_Amt,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,0) Cdma_Las_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_amt_act,0)Cdma_Las_amt_act,NVL(S3.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,1)Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Cdma_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_Amt,0)Cdma_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,0)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_amt_act,0)Cdma_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) Cdma_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.Cdma_Last_Amt,Q4.Cdma_Las_amt_unact,Q4.Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.Cdma_Now_Amt,Q5.Cdma_Now_amt_act,Q5.Cdma_Now_amt_unact,Q5.Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 as Cdma_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Cdma_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Cdma_Las_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增'))Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Cdma_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Cdma_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Cdma_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='CDMA' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增')) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name

select * from (SELECT Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_Amt,0)Itv_Now_Amt,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_amt_unact,0)Itv_Now_amt_unact,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_amt_act,0)Itv_Now_amt_act,NVL(S3.Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate,1)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate FROM (select 0 end)/count(*)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增') group by s1.ZJ_AREA_NAME)S3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET S2 ON S3.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) Q2 ON q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 ON Q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME where q2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME not in ('合计','鄞州政企部') order by Q1.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select Q4.Zj_Name,Q4.Itv_Last_Amt,Q4.Itv_Las_amt_unact,Q4.Itv_Las_amt_act,Q4.Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate,Q5.Itv_Now_Amt,Q5.Itv_Now_amt_act,Q5.Itv_Now_amt_unact,Q5.Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate,0 AS Itv_Last_Reward from (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Itv_Last_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Las_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Itv_Las_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('上月新增'))Q4 LEFT JOIN (select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) Itv_Now_Amt,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_act, sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=0 then 1 else 0 end)Itv_Now_amt_unact,sum(case when s1.ACT_FLG=1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)Itv_Now_Amt_act_rate from ${tableName} s1 where s1.type='ITV' and s1.XZ_FLG in('当月新增')) Q5 ON Q4.Zj_Name=Q5.Zj_Name
